titles.title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act for FERC Project No. 9401, the Mt. Hope Waterpower Project.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 9/25/1998--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a specified licensee, to extend commencement of construction of the Mt. Hope Waterpower Project until August 3, 2002.
